metadata.title: CVE-2020-8031 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Open Build Service allows remote attackers to store JS code in markdown that is not properly escaped, impacting confidentiality and integrity. This issue affects: Open Build Service versions prior to 2.10.8.

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
